topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ac414a6368722e55000354#post_55ac414a6368722e55000354
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ac41486368721c34000e02#post_55ac41486368721c34000e02

It's almost like the world is against you or something. But you remains optimistic and integral. That what makes you awesome.[/bq]
It's not such much "the world is against me" so much as my family is filled with such horrible people that they don't care about anyone other than themselves.

[spoiler]
Not to drag personal life stuff into it but to illustrate the point my brother is such a horrible person that back when me and my mom lived with my abusive ex-stepdad my brother knew she was getting raped and he had the capability to give her a place to live and he didn't cause his idea of "fixing" the problem was to get her to go back to her husband cause "the bible says women should have a man in her life"(tm).

You know someone is a horrible shitstain of a human being when their reaction to their mom showing up on their doorstep crying that she needs somewhere to be is to shove her back out the door and call her rapist to pick her up and take her back.
[/spoiler]

Tl:dr; my life doesn't suck cause "the world is against me"; rather it's cause my family is a bunch of shitstains upon the human race that do not care about anyone ever and only care about money.

If you aren't rich they don't care about you and they will literally give you away.
